sentence.Network_en: The serf - owners had the right to beat , abuse or even kill the serfs at will.
sentence.Network_cn: (那时) 农奴主 有权任意打骂甚至杀害农奴.

sentence.Network_en: In the Middle Ages, a lord and a serf had very different places in life.
sentence.Network_cn: 中世纪, 农奴主和农奴在生活中是两个截然不同的阶级.

sentence.Network_en: This movement overthrew the serf system and freed a million serfs and slaves.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一运动推翻了农奴制,并且解放了百万农奴和奴隶.

list.abs: however , some people in the Tibetan ruling group were totally opposed to reform andhue and cry about their determination never to carry it out , in order to perpetuate the feudal serf system .但是，当时西藏上层统治集团中的一些人从根本上反对改革，叫嚣“长期不改，永远不改”，试图永远保持封建农奴制度。

however , some people in the Tibetan ruling group were totally opposed to reform andhue and cry about their determination never to carry it out , in order to perpetuate the feudal serf system .但是，当时西藏上层统治集团中的一些人从根本上反对改革，叫嚣“长期不改，永远不改”，试图永远保持封建农奴制度。

at that time , there was a saying circulating among the serfs , " All that I can take with me is my own shadow , and all that I leave behind is my own footprints . "当时在农奴中流传着这样的话：“能带走的只有自己的身影，能留下的只有自己的脚印。”

the serf , in the period of serfdom , raised himself to membership in the commune , just as the petty bourgeois , under the yoke of feudal absolutism , managed to develop into a bourgeois .农奴曾经在农奴制度下挣扎到公社社员的地位，小资产者曾经在封建专制制度的束缚下挣扎到资产者的地位。
the serf an assured existence , the proletarian has not .农奴生活有保障，无产者生活无保障。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense slave): from Old French, from Latin servus 'slave'

entry.def: In former times, serfs were a class of people who had to work on a particular person's land and could not leave without that person's permission.

means.word_mean: 1. (Middle Ages) a person who is bound to the land and owned by the feudal lord

sentences.en: They did not allow the serfs any freedom.
sentences.cn: 他们不给农奴任何自由。

sentences.cn: (那时)农奴主有权任意打骂甚至杀害农奴。

sentences.en: In the Middle Ages,a lord and a serf had very different places in life.
sentences.cn: 中世纪,农奴主和农奴在生活中是两个截然不同的阶级。

sentences.en: This movement overthrew the serf system and freed a million serfs and slaves.
sentences.cn: 这一运动推翻了农奴制,并且解放了百万农奴和奴隶。
